title: Russillo Book Club: Our First Civil War: 'Patriots and Loyalists in the American Revolution' by H.W. Brands. Plus, Life Advice.
description:
Russillo is joined by historian H.W. Brands to discuss his book on the American Revolution (0:50). Then, Ryen answers some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (40:57).

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: H.W. Brands
Producers: Kyle Crichton and Steve Ceruti
